caption.p: a The number of OTUs classified as potential fungal pathogens from invasive A. philoxeroides (circles) and native A. sessilis (squares) rhizosphere soils collected along a latitudinal gradient. Lines indicate the effects of latitude. b The effects of latitude on the number of nematode knots on roots of invasive A. philoxeroides (light gray) and native A. sessilis (dark gray) plants grown in these soils
